summary.span: 擴充 類別以實作公開自訂程式撰寫模型的主機。

span.span: Extends the class to implement hosts that expose custom programming models.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 類別建立提供自訂程式設計模型的主機。Use the class to create hosts that provide a custom programming model. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務程式設計模型運用類別。The Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service programming model uses the class. 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid destructors; they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非參考成員，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 。Avoid non-reference members; they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用完成項，但如果您要加入完成項，則應隱藏建置警告並從 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 呼叫 和完成項本身，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 這個範例會使用衍生自 的 類別。This sample uses the class, which is derived from . [!code-csharp[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/cs/wholeenchilada.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/vb/wholeenchilada.vb#1)]

param.name: endpoint

span.span: The service endpoint.

summary.span: 將指定的服務端點加入至裝載的服務。

span.span: Adds the specified service endpoint to the hosted service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法時，服務主機會執行"由-組態-name"的驗證上的合約描述。When using the method, the service host does a "by-configuration-name" validation on the contract description. 換句話說，主應用程式會確認存在於服務所實作的服務合約的組態名稱的清單。In other words, the host verifies that exists in the list of configuration names of the service contracts implemented by the service. 如果通過驗證中的說明使用，因為它是，即使從反映的服務是不同。If the validation passes, the description in the is used as it is, even if the reflected from the service is different. 例如，假設 ServiceEndpoint 中的說明和反映來自服務的合約描述有相同的名稱，但有不同的作業行為。As an example, assume that the description in the ServiceEndpoint and the contract description reflected from the service have the same name, but different operation behaviors. 只有 「 由-組態-名稱 」 驗證的含意是不會有任何驗證行為都相同，並有一個描述更新因為另一個描述。The implication of only "by-configuration-name" validation is that there is no validation that the behaviors are the same and there are one updates to one description because of another description. 如果 `address` 是相對 URI，則 的其中一個基底位址 (視繫結通訊協定而定) 會當成端點的基底位址使用。If the `address` is a relative URI, one of the base addresses of the (depending on the binding protocol) is used as the endpoint's base address.

exception.span: 為 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 主機的狀態並不是已建立或開啟中，或是裝載之服務沒有任何 。

span.span: The host is not in a Created or an Opening state or there is no for the hosted service.

exception.span: 、 或 屬性為 。

span.span: The , , or property is .

summary.span: 關閉裝載的服務，包括其通道發送器以及相關執行個體內容和接聽程式。

span.span: Closes down the hosted service, including their channel dispatchers and associated instance contexts and listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 會執行下列動作：Calling does the following: - 關閉所有對於 的輸入，這也會關閉其相關的 執行個體。Closes all input to , which also closes their associated instances. 如此一來，任何新的通道都不會被接受。This stops any new channels from being accepting. - 針對所有 物件呼叫 ，代表這些物件會停止接受新訊息。Calls on all objects, which mean they stop accepting new messages. - 等待所有 物件在其相關通道完成傳送所有擱置訊息之後關閉。Waits for all objects to close down, which happens when their associated channels finish sending all pending messages. - 關閉與主機關聯的 物件。Closes the objects associated with the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClosed() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放服務主機使用的資源。

span.span: Releases resources used by the service host.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event UnknownMessageReceived As EventHandler(Of UnknownMessageReceivedEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於收到未知訊息時。

span.span: Occurs when an unknown message is received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 使用時，將公開裝載的端點，和擲回例外狀況是，主應用程式將訊息傳遞至事件處理常式。When using , exposing a hosting endpoint, and a exception is thrown, the host passes the message to the event handler. 如果嘗試讀取此訊息就會擲回。If an attempt is made to read this message an is thrown. 例外狀況的描述會說 「 這個訊息無法支援作業因為已讀取。 」The description of the exception will say "This message cannot support the operation because it has been read." WCF 基礎結構會讀取擷取的訊息參數時的訊息。The WCF infrastructure reads the message while extracting the message parameters. 此訊息會傳遞至事件處理常式，並嘗試讀取會造成例外狀況。This message is then passed to the event handler and any attempt to read it causes an exception. 如果您需要存取訊息參數，在您裝載的端點，從處理常式定義使用 MessageContract 裝載端點合約，並將所需的資料放入訊息標頭。If you need to access message parameters in your handler from a hosting endpoint, define the hosting endpoint contract using MessageContract and place the needed data into a message header. 如需裝載端點的詳細資訊，請參閱[Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)For more information about hosting endpoints, see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)
